trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag> event occurs during a drag-and-drop operation and allows the drag source to determine whether the drag-and-drop operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag>evento ocorrer durante uma operação de arrastar e soltar e permite que a fonte determinar se a operação de arrastar e soltar deve ser cancelada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag>

trans-unit.source: A QueryContinueDragEventArgs specifies whether and how the drag-and-drop operation should proceed, whether any modifier keys are pressed, and whether the user has pressed the ESC key.
trans-unit.target: Um QueryContinueDragEventArgs Especifica se e como a operação de arrastar e soltar deve continuar, se quaisquer teclas modificadoras são pressionadas e se o usuário pressionou a tecla ESC.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag> event sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction?displayProperty=fullName> if the ESC key was pressed and sets `Action` to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction?displayProperty=fullName> if the left, middle, or right mouse button is pressed.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag>conjuntos de eventos <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A>para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction?displayProperty=fullName>se a tecla ESC foi pressionada e define `Action` para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction?displayProperty=fullName>se o botão esquerdo, central ou direito do mouse é pressionado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag>

trans-unit.source: For information about the event model, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre o modelo de evento, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The current state of the SHIFT, CTRL, and ALT keys.
trans-unit.target: O estado atual das teclas SHIFT, CTRL e ALT.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the ESC key was pressed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a tecla ESC foi pressionada; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DragAction"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DragAction"></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the status of a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o status de uma operação de arrastar e soltar.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag> event sets Action to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction?displayProperty=fullName> if the ESC key was pressed and sets `Action` to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction?displayProperty=fullName> if the left, middle, or right mouse button is pressed.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag>evento define a ação <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction?displayProperty=fullName>se a tecla ESC foi pressionada e define `Action` para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction?displayProperty=fullName>se o botão esquerdo, central ou direito do mouse é pressionado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DragAction"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DragAction"></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: Gets whether the user pressed the ESC key.
trans-unit.target: Obtém se o usuário pressionou a tecla ESC.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag> event sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction?displayProperty=fullName> if EscapePressed is true.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag>conjuntos de eventos <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A>para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction?displayProperty=fullName>se EscapePressed for true.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the ESC key was pressed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a tecla ESC foi pressionada; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current state of the SHIFT, CTRL, and ALT keys.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estado atual do teclas ALT, CTRL e SHIFT.

trans-unit.source: The bits that are set in the KeyState property identify the keys or mouse buttons that were pressed during the operation.
trans-unit.target: Os bits definidos na propriedade KeyState identificam as chaves ou os botões de mouse foram pressionado durante a operação.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the left mouse button is pressed, the first bit in the KeyState property is set.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se o botão esquerdo do mouse é pressionado, o primeiro bit na propriedade KeyState está definido.

trans-unit.source: You can use the bitwise `AND` operator to test for a given key state.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o bit a bit `AND` operador para testar um determinado estado de chave.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the bits that are set for a specified event.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir lista os bits definidos para um evento especificado.

trans-unit.source: |Bit|Key| |---------|---------| |1|The left mouse button.| |2|The right mouse button.| |4|The SHIFT key.| |8|The CTL key.| |16|The middle mouse button.| |32|The ALT key.| By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag> event sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction?displayProperty=fullName> if KeyState indicates that the left, middle, or right mouse button is pressed.
trans-unit.target: | Bit | Chave | |---------|---------| |&1; | O botão esquerdo do mouse. | |&2; | O botão direito do mouse. | |&4; | A tecla SHIFT. | |&8; | A chave da lista de certificados confiáveis. | |&16; | O botão do meio. | |&32; | A tecla ALT. | Por padrão, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag>conjuntos de eventos <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A>para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction?displayProperty=fullName>se KeyState indica que o botão esquerdo, central ou direito do mouse é pressionado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag>

trans-unit.source: The current state of the SHIFT, CTRL, and ALT keys.
trans-unit.target: O estado atual das teclas SHIFT, CTRL e ALT.
